title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7051.10 - Reportable incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7051.10 - Reportable incidents

State Regulations

If a reportable incident occurs while an inmate is absent
from the facility to attend a funeral or deathbed visit, facility staff shall
report such incident to the Commission of Correction pursuant to the
requirements of Part 7022 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7051.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
